warning.use_case: Important notices, service disruptions, early closures

urgent.use_case: Emergency closures, safety warnings, critical information

emergency.use_case: Storm warnings, immediate danger, total closures

usage_notes: Set active: true to display banner on website
Set active: false to hide banner
expires_at: null means banner shows until manually disabled
expires_at: ISO timestamp will auto-hide banner after that time
level determines visual urgency (color, icon, prominence)
Always include clear call-to-action or next steps in message
